attributes.action: Help the Uighur Muslims who are held against their will and treated inhumanely.
attributes.additional_details: What if it becomes another nazi regime, branching out towards our democratic civilization.
attributes.background: Their is drone footage of Uighur Muslims being taken off a train, with hood covering and bound by the wrists. This is inhumane enough never mind the abuse these people suffer and its not right to stand by and atleadt not try to help. We can't wait till its too late to help.
